title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Gender Experience-Based Language Project Design—Professional Learning for Women

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced language proficiency and specialized professional work experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Female learners can freely implement language collaboration strategies without gender influence in project-based environments
Learners compare and analyze differences in learning effectiveness between women-only and coeducational environments to derive optimal learning strategies
Through language project deliverables, learners demonstrate gender-sensitive communication skills required in professional contexts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
